ClassDesc: Implementation of the @B_android#support#v7#widget#SnapHelper_E@ supporting snapping in either vertical or horizontal orientation. The implementation will snap the center of the target child view to the center of the attached @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView_E@. If you intend to change this behavior then override @B_android#support#v7#widget#SnapHelper#calculateDistanceToFinalSnap_E@.
